resources.string: Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!
Authentication failed, check your student ID and password
Not a member? Get registered in Firebase now!
We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.

Canopy-Rasoi is a one stop solution to every student of IIIT Bhubaneswar for all issues related to Online Mess Coupons Bookings.


Some salient features of this app are :-
 - One time login through M-UMS(Hibiscus) password.No other account verification required.
 - Easy and hassle free Booking on internet as well as intranet.
 - Interactive and User Friendly UI.
 - One can see the final layout of his/her coupons of the week.
 - Bookings can be done anytime from monday to thursday.
 - It contains the menu of food made in both Messes.
 - Anyone can check their bookings for any day of the week.
 - Reminder to book Mess Coupons.
 - Facility to reset user credentials after any change in password of hibiscus.


Upcoming features to be introduced shortly in the app are :-

- Setting Default Mess Booking Coupons for upcoming weeks.
 - Complaint Section where anyone can post any issues related to Mess.
